A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've loved Star Wars since I was a little kid growing up\, but left the theater stunned at how much I hated The Last Jedi.  While there were some excellent call backs to the old movies and good action sequences\, I hated the direction Rian Johnson took the story.   I can't believe Kathleen Kennedy and Disney allowed him to do it.  No true Star Wars fan would have written that.  Sad is all I can say.
